org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.works

Class ByTermDeleteWorkExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.impl.lucene.works.ByTermDeleteWorkExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LuceneWorkExecutor

    public final class ByTermDeleteWorkExecutor
extends Object
    Extension of DeleteLuceneWork that will always perform the delete LuceneWork in an optimal way, since the underlying data store guarantee uniqueness of terms across different entity types.
    Author:
    gustavonalle
    See Also:
    DeleteWorkExecutor
